org.sd.cio.mapreduce
Class DirWalker

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.cio.mapreduce.DirWalker
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, Governable
public class DirWalker
extends java.lang.Object
implements Governable

Base class for walking over directories and files (optionally) in a governable thread, applying a fileOperation to each selected file and/or directory.

To run an instance within a governable thread, do (for example):

GovernableThread.newGovernableThread(dirWalker, true);

Author:
Spence Koehler

Constructor Detail

DirWalker

public DirWalker(java.io.File rootDir,
                 DirectorySelector dirSelector,
                 FileSelector fileSelector,
                 FileOperator fileOperator)
Construct non-verbose non-governed instance with the given params.

Parameters:
rootDir - path to root directory or file to process.
dirSelector - directory selector (always DESCENDs if null).
fileSelector - file selector (always selects if null).
fileOperator - file operator to apply to each selected file.

DirWalker

public DirWalker(boolean verbose,
                 UnitCounter uc,
                 java.io.File rootDir,
                 DirectorySelector dirSelector,
                 FileSelector fileSelector,
                 FileOperator fileOperator)
Construct with the given params.

Parameters:
verbose - Indicates whether to show progress.
uc - Unit counter to monitor/control progress (possibly null).
rootDir - path to root directory or file to process.
dirSelector - directory selector (always DESCENDs if null).
fileSelector - file selector (always selects if null).
fileOperator - file operator to aply to each selected file.
Method Detail

iterator

public static final java.util.Iterator<java.io.File> iterator(java.io.File rootDir,
                                                              DirectorySelector dirSelector,
                                                              FileSelector fileSelector)
Utility method to iterate over selected files.

NOTE: Be aware that the iterator spawns a new thread that runs a DirWalker instance.

Parameters:
rootDir - The directory (or file) at which to start walking.
dirSelector - A directory selector strategy (always DESCENDs if null).
fileSelector - A file selector strategy (always selects if null).
Returns:
the iterator over selected files.

count

public static final int count(java.io.File rootDir,
                              DirectorySelector dirSelector,
                              FileSelector fileSelector)
Utility method to count the number of selected files.

Parameters:
rootDir - The directory (or file) at which to start walking.
dirSelector - A directory selector strategy (always DESCENDs if null).
fileSelector - A file selector strategy (always selects if null).

mapper

public static final <T> DirWalker mapper(boolean verbose,
                                         UnitCounter uc,
                                         java.io.File rootDir,
                                         DirectorySelector dirSelector,
                                         FileSelector fileSelector,
                                         FileRecordIteratorFactory<T> recordIteratorFactory,
                                         RecordOperator<T,java.io.File> recordOperator)
Factory method for a DirWalker for mapping each record (of type T) within selected files, halting if/when recordOperator returns false.

                                          java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean needsReduce)
Factory method for a DirWalker for reducing mapped records (of type T) from within selected files, halting if/when mergeOperator returns false.
